content:
Hi doc enthousiasts,
browsing through the bug issues in GitHub, I found this issue https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/9898 which turns out to be more a need of documenting when API Tokens are automatically created, we could discuss such an addition see if there are other gaps in the token/auth section at the next meeting :)

Sure, please add it to the agenda linked from https://www.gdcc.io/working-groups/documentation.html

(Please click "request access" if needed.)
